Jollibee Chicken Nuggets Menu

Crispy, juicy, and perfectly seasoned chicken nuggets that are loved by kids and adults alike. Made with premium chicken and our special blend of spices.

Chicken Nuggets Prices - June 2025 Updated

Our chicken nuggets are made from tender, all-white meat chicken, coated in our signature crispy breading. Perfect as a snack, meal, or for sharing with family and friends.

View Complete Nuggets Menu
